message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more than that. How about a 55/45 split?
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers, 58-42 is a fair compromise.
Time is running out, and the money is losing value.  I'm willing to meet closer to the middle with a 53/47 split. Let's close this deal.
I see you're willing to move, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 57-43?
This is getting ridiculous.  We both lose if we don't agree soon. 52/48 is my final offer.
